mapper.select:
select ai.id, ai.order_id, ai.remark, ai.create_date, ai.del_flag,
oi.code as orderCode, oi.materials_code, oi.total_price, oi.status,
si.code as supplierCode, si.name as supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images as supplierImages,
mi.name as materialsName, mi.model, mi.images as materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit from abnormal_info ai where 1 = 1
AND si.name like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.supplierName},"%")
AND oi.code like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.orderCode},"%")
order by ai.create_date desc
